alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Jo Daviess; Stephenson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 20 at 3:32AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Jo Daviess, northeastern Carroll and Stephenson Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 332 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lena, or 12 miles west of Freeport, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lena around 335 AM CDT. Cedarville around 340 AM CDT. Winslow around 345 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
